name: Idle Bricks Breaker Shooter
description:
Idle Bricks Breaker Shooter is one of the Best casual games in 2019
Chill your mind with the most addictive Idle game!

Swipe your finger to control your balls and destroy all the incoming blocks.

Collect millions of coins to buy your upgrades, improve your stats and reach higher levels.

You have the perfect time killer at your hands,
You can play this game any time anywhere, due to the simple game controls.

The gameplay is fun and challenging,
Dominate your friends through the global leaderboards, achieve infinite fame!

FEATURES
- Automate your workflow to increase your idle income
- Get idle cash, even when you are offline
- Smooth, addictive gameplay
- Lasers to make your life easier
- Upgrade system with various elements
- Balance, harmony and simplicity
- Many rewards
- No internet connection needed
WHAT'S NEW
Wow! It is here!!
Get Ready for the best Idle Shooter experience.
Updates every week.
Enjoy:)
